title: Large, Attractive & Comfortable Single Room
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Large/spacious, attractive and comfortable studio type single room AVAILABLE NOW - suitable for one person only. 

FEATURES & FACILITIES:

-Open plan kitchen (not shared) with mini oven, fridge, microwave, kettle, etc.
-Newly decorated
-Washing machine
-Clean and tidy
-New bathroom
-Located just off Kilburn High Road (Maida Vale end)
-2 minutes from tube station with Bakerloo line
-Opposite Kilburn High Road overground (railway) station
-Local buses: 16, 31, 32, 98, 139, 189, 206, 316, 328 & 632 / Night buses: N16, N28 & N31
-Nearby shops (Tesco, Marks & Spencer, Sainsbury, Aldi, etc.)
-Ideal for travelling to West End (central London)
-Use of 2 toilets and shower

-FREE WIRELESS BROADBAND INTERNET

-FULLY FURNISHED

-SECURE AND SAFE

-NO BILLS TO PAY (INCLUDED IN RENT)

PLEASE NOTE: 

-Do not contact us if you are an agent
-We do not accept Housing Benefit
-Room is for one person only

-YOU MUST BE A NON-SMOKER.

RENT = £120 per week (no bills).


CONTACT INFO:

CALL OR TEXT WITH YOUR NAME and other details for more information or to arrange a viewing:

07879953300

NO EMAILS PLEASE.
